name: Paintable
description: Base class for all Paintable entities. This class provides customization for materials, exposing common functions to allow you to set custom material parameters, including loading textures from disk.

functions.name: SetMaterial
functions.description: Sets the material at the specified index of this Actor

parameters.name: material_path
parameters.description: The new Material to apply

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The material index to apply (-1 means all indices)

parameters.name: attachable_id
parameters.description: The attachable ID (set with AddSkeletalMeshAttached or AddStaticMeshAttached) to apply the material. Pass empty to set on main mesh only

functions.name: SetMaterialFromCanvas
functions.description: Sets the material at the specified index of this Actor to a Canvas object

parameters.name: canvas
parameters.description: The Canvas object to use as a material

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The material index to apply (-1 means all indices)

functions.name: SetMaterialFromSceneCapture
functions.description: Sets the material at the specified index of this Actor to a SceneCapture object

parameters.name: scene_capture
parameters.description: The SceneCapture object to use as a material

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The material index to apply (-1 means all indices)

functions.name: SetMaterialFromWebUI
functions.description: Sets the material at the specified index of this Actor to a WebUI object

parameters.name: webui
parameters.description: The WebUI object to use as a material

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The material index to apply (-1 means all indices)

functions.name: ResetMaterial
functions.description: Resets the material from the specified index to the original one

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The material index to apply (-1 means all indices)

parameters.name: attachable_id
parameters.description: The attachable ID (set with AddSkeletalMeshAttached or AddStaticMeshAttached) to reset the material. Pass empty to reset on main mesh only

functions.name: SetMaterialColorParameter
functions.description: Sets a Color parameter in this Actor's material

parameters.name: parameter_name
parameters.description: The name of the material parameter

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: The value to set

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The material index to apply (-1 means all indices)

parameters.name: attachable_id
parameters.description: The attachable ID (set with AddSkeletalMeshAttached or AddStaticMeshAttached) to apply the material parameter. Pass empty to set on main mesh only

functions.name: SetMaterialScalarParameter
functions.description: Sets a Scalar parameter in this Actor's material

parameters.name: parameter_name
parameters.description: The name of the material parameter

parameters.name: scalar
parameters.description: The value to set

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The material index to apply (-1 means all indices)

parameters.name: attachable_id
parameters.description: The attachable ID (set with AddSkeletalMeshAttached or AddStaticMeshAttached) to apply the material parameter. Pass empty to set on main mesh only

functions.name: SetMaterialTextureParameter
functions.description: Sets a texture parameter in this Actor's material to an image

parameters.name: parameter_name
parameters.description: The name of the material parameter

parameters.name: texture_path
parameters.description: The path to texture, a url or a base64

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The material index to apply (-1 means all indices)

parameters.name: attachable_id
parameters.description: The attachable ID (set with AddSkeletalMeshAttached or AddStaticMeshAttached) to apply the material parameter. Pass empty to set on main mesh only

functions.name: SetMaterialVectorParameter
functions.description: Sets a Vector parameter in this Actor's material

parameters.name: parameter_name
parameters.description: The name of the material parameter

parameters.name: vector
parameters.description: The value to set

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The material index to apply (-1 means all indices)

parameters.name: attachable_id
parameters.description: The attachable ID (set with AddSkeletalMeshAttached or AddStaticMeshAttached) to apply the material parameter. Pass empty to set on main mesh only

functions.name: GetMaterialColorParameter
functions.description: Gets a Color parameter from this Actor's material

parameters.name: parameter_name
parameters.description: The name of the material parameter

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The material index to get

parameters.name: attachable_id
parameters.description: The attachable ID (set with AddSkeletalMeshAttached or AddStaticMeshAttached) to get the material parameter. Pass empty to get from main mesh only

return.name: color
return.description: or nil if parameter was not found

functions.name: GetMaterialVectorParameter
functions.description: Gets a Vector parameter from this Actor's material

parameters.name: parameter_name
parameters.description: The name of the material parameter

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The material index to get

parameters.name: attachable_id
parameters.description: The attachable ID (set with AddSkeletalMeshAttached or AddStaticMeshAttached) to get the material parameter. Pass empty to get from main mesh only

return.name: vector
return.description: or nil if parameter was not found

functions.name: GetMaterialTextureParameter
functions.description: Gets a Texture parameter from this Actor's material

parameters.name: parameter_name
parameters.description: The name of the material parameter

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The material index to get

parameters.name: attachable_id
parameters.description: The attachable ID (set with AddSkeletalMeshAttached or AddStaticMeshAttached) to get the material parameter. Pass empty to get from main mesh only

return.name: texture
return.description: or nil if parameter was not found

functions.name: GetMaterialScalarParameter
functions.description: Gets a Scalar parameter from this Actor's material

parameters.name: parameter_name
parameters.description: The name of the material parameter

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The material index to get

parameters.name: attachable_id
parameters.description: The attachable ID (set with AddSkeletalMeshAttached or AddStaticMeshAttached) to get the material parameter. Pass empty to get from main mesh only

return.name: scalar
return.description: or nil if parameter was not found

functions.name: SetPhysicalMaterial
functions.description: Overrides this Actor's Physical Material with a new one

parameters.name: physical_material_path
parameters.description: The Physical Material to override
